        Parameters:
        recordNumber - The zero-based record number.
        Returns:

      • deleteRecord

        public void deleteRecord(int recordNumber)

      • getRecordsInBoundingBox

        public java.util.ArrayList<ShapeFileRecord> getRecordsInBoundingBox(BoundingBox box,
                                                                    double minSize)
        Returns an ArrayList of ShapeFileRecords that are within an area described by a BoundingBox, which usually corresponds with a mapped area.
        Parameters:
        box - The bounding box describing the extent of the area into which the data will be mapped.
        minSize - The minimum size of feature to be mapped, in map units. This is based on the size of a single pixel, in map units, which is affected by the scale of the map.
        Returns:
        An array list of ShapeFileRecords that intersect with the map area bounding box and that are larger than the minimum size..

      • clipRecordsToBoundingBox

        public java.util.ArrayList<ShapeFileRecord> clipRecordsToBoundingBox(BoundingBox box,
                                                                     double minSize)

      • getAttributeTable

        public AttributeTable getAttributeTable()
        Gets the AttributeTable object associated with this ShapeFile. If no database exists for this ShapeFile null will be returned.
        Returns:
        AttributeTable object or null
